title: Growth Curves for Sitka Spruce Trees in 1988
description:
Description
The Sitka data frame has 395 rows and 4 columns.  It gives repeated
measurements on the log-size of 79 Sitka spruce trees, 54 of which
were grown in ozone-enriched chambers and 25 were controls.  The size
was measured five times in 1988, at roughly monthly intervals.
reference:
P. J. Diggle, K.-Y. Liang and S. L. Zeger (1994)
Analysis of Longitudinal Data.
Clarendon Press, Oxford

parameters.treat:
either "ozone" for an ozone-enriched
chamber or "control".
parameters.Time: time of measurement in  days since 1 January 1988.
parameters.size:
measured size (height times diameter squared) of
tree, on log scale.

format: This data frame contains the following columns:
